DOC.brief_summary: This study will use Continuous Glucose Monitoring to assess differences in glycemic profiles between vildagliptin and glimepiride.
DOC.brief_title: Vildagliptin Glycemic Profiles Assessment Using a Continuous Glucose Monitoring Device.
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes patients on stable metformin 1870 years old Willing to perform at least 4 capillary blood glucose tests per day Type 2 diabetes patients on any other antidiabetic treatment Patients listed in other trials Patients with significant diabetic organ disease or complications. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
